issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
[ERROR] Failed to compile Java source files:
[ERROR]   
[ERROR] /Users/piccilore/Documents/Appcelerator_Studio_Workspace/Blue hour/build/android/gen/android/support/compat/R.java:3475: error: <identifier> expected
[ERROR]         public static final int 006presentation_cc9483e121=0x7f020000;


006presentation.png is my image, I don't understand what is the problem.
fields.summary: Android do not compile, error on image

comments.body:
[~otto.pic],
Thanks for reaching out! What version of SDK and Android do you have? 
Do you have some test case to demonstrate what you are trying?
We can offer you to look into your code and help to identify errors.
I have found the problem... if image file name start with number, it get error... I have tried with 7.5.1 and 8.0.0 too.
Hello [~otto.pic], Please share a sample app for us to test the issue on our end. Thanks.

[~otto.pic],
Did you notice our last reply ? Let us know the current status of your issue. Can you please share a simple test case to reproduce the issue on our end.
